body: George shares with his readers favourite jokes from around the world from an article he read in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from an article written by Joris Luyendijk in “Startwo: Lifestyle”: "Here are some that I as visitor from Africa and any other developing country found so amusing, as it relates to what we know so well."
original_body: George shares with his readers favourite jokes from around the world from an article he read in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from an article written by Joris Luyendijk in “Startwo: Lifestyle”: "Here are some that I as visitor from Africa and any other developing country found so amusing, as it relates to what we know so well."
title: World: Humor from around the world
